Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Charlie's life prior to or as the outbreak began, except that he suffered from a sleepwalking condition.
Post-Apocalypse[]: Overnight, Charlie perishes to the sickness that has spread along Cell Block D and reanimates as a walker . He doesn't attack anyone because he locks himself in his cell due to his sleep walking condition. He is later discovered and put down by Rick . His corpse is later examined by Dr. Subramanian whom deduces that he had died from a deadly form of the flu.
Death[]: Killed By The Flu (Alive) During the night, Charlie succumbs to the flu and dies in his cell. Rick Grimes (Zombified) The next day, a zombified Charlie is found by Rick in his cell and is stabbed in the head.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Charlie has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies
Name: Charlie
